text: Claudia Kristofics-Binder (born 5 October 1961) is an Austrian former figure skater. She is a two-time World bronze medalist (1981, 1982) and the 1982 European champion. She represented Austria at the 1976 and 1980 Winter Olympics. She was coached by Carlo Fassi. She is the younger sister of Austrian figure skater Helmut Kristofics-Binder. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! style="background-color: #ffdead; " colspan=8 align=center | International |- !
